title: Nuveen California AMT-Free Quality Municipal Income Fund (NKX) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen California AMT-Free Quality Municipal Income Fund ( NKX  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.052 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased NKX prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 13th quarter that NKX has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $15.14, the dividend yield is 4.12%.
The previous trading day's last sale of NKX was $15.14, representing a -2.89% decrease from the 52 week high of $15.59 and a 22.59% increase over the 52 week low of $12.35.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the NKX Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
